data.title: Hurst, Vannessa
data.text:
Mrs. Vannessa Richardson teaches eighth-grade Gifted and Talented and Honors ELA classes.

She has been teaching since 2004. Ms. Richardson coached volleyball and track at Terrell ISD and then taught ELA and AVID at Durham MS before coming to ACMS in 2016. For the past several years, she has been the ACMS UIL Coordinator and Eighth Grade Team Leader.

She is a graduate of Arlington Baptist University and she is continuing her education at the University of Oklahoma. Boomer!

Mrs. Richardson, her husband, and her daughters live in North Carrollton and her daughters attend LISD schools. You can usually find Mrs. Richardson cheering on the ACMS Eagles and Hebron Hawks at various events, coaching her daughter's volleyball team, and supporting her other daughter's softball dreams.

Skywardis used for the most accurate representation of a student's grade. Please remember to refer to Canvasfor classroom calendar, updates, information and resources.
